reviewText: This was a very valuable tool and I would highly recommend it for anyone who is thinking of starting a home-based business.  There were so many great tips and I found it to be a common sense approach to business.  It covered many things that I hadn't thought about before and after viewing it I knew the steps I need to take to begin.  I give it two thumbs up!

I found this very thought provoking.  I'm using it for myself, but think I'll get one for my sister for Christmas.  I found the info very useful.
Karen- Thousand Oaks
A must see for anyone who is thinking about a home business or not sure what to do next in their career.

This DVD piqued my interest because it was recommended by a savvy friend of mine.  I was very impressed with how content-driven and helpful this business tool is.  It is a must-have not just for those who are "home" entrepreneurs, but for those who hope to be successful in any of their endeavors.
this was recommended by a friend -- it is excellent!  Hands on information with details I wish I had known before --- sure would have avoided a lot of costly mistakes.

This is by far the best DVD for clear information and easy instruction on how to start your own home based business.  I really used it alot and got my money's worth many times over. My  home business is already on its way and I know this DVD helped me a lot to get it going! Thanks!!!!
This video is right on the money! Get's you where you need to go. A great help!

What a great video!  Why read when you can watch?

Perhaps the best video I've seen on starting your home business, a must watch if you're serious about working at home.

This DVD is worth it!

Cole in Colorado
